mapper.insert: insert into admin (admin_id, name, gender, user_group, state, city, address, password, phone, notes) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_group = #{userGroup,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select admin_id, name, gender, user_group, state, city, address, password, phone, notes from admin where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select admin_id, name, gender, user_group, state, city, address, password, phone, notes from admin
